title: Large 2 Bed, Heat and hot water included, Park Slope, No Fee!!!!!!!!!!
posting_body: ['Charming and Spacious front facing 2-bedroom 1-bathroom apartment located on a beautiful tree-lined block in prime Park Slope!', 'For more info or to schedule a private viewing, please contact Noah 832-566-2652', 'Apartment Features:', '- Modern kitchen, dishwasher and microwave included', '- Sunlit!', 'Windows throughout', '- 2 sizable bedrooms', '- Large, separate living room', '- Separate Kitchen area', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Fully tiled bathroom', '- Closets in each room', '- Exposed brick lends rustic charm', '- Heat and hot water included', '- Pets allowed case by case', 'Great location!', 'Just steps to Prospect Park and even fewer to the F/G train.', 'Top notch restaurants, bars and cafes at your door steps.', 'Located on 8th Ave between 8th and 9th St.', 'This unit will definitely not stay on the market long, so schedule your viewing ASAP!', 'Applicants must have good credit and verifiable income.', 'Guarantors are welcome', 'For more information on this unit or to schedule a private viewing, please reach out via text to Noah, 832-566-2652.']
